pr_title: [#10264] Remove Instructor Google ID from Output

timeline.message: Add frontend accommodation and tests for null googleId

timeline.bodyText: After much debugging I've isolated the problem with the e2e tests to the addition of this line. Whenever verifyPresentInDatastore is called in a test case for instructors, the BackDoor will attempt to execute a GET request on the /instructors endpoint. This will now however always throw a NPE because userInfo.getId() is null. Any advice to help resolve this would be appreciated @wkurniawan07 @xpdavid @jtankw3
timeline.author: madanalogy

replies.bodyText: We can add userInfo != null first?
replies.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: I was hoping against that because the getMinAuthLevel is already defined as LOGGED_IN. There appears to be another issue as well with UpdateInstructorAction. I'm working with @jtankw3 to help resolve it
replies.author: madanalogy

replies.bodyText: By design, the execute() method should not care about access control (this is the complete seperation of access control we want to achieve in V7) so we are not breaking any promise.
replies.author: xpdavid

timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: This might actually count as Google ID leaking, but I guess someone who has the privilege of updating instructor has no harm of knowing the Google ID.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: All the changes in this file are unrelated
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: Do we still need this USER_ID parameter, now that you are guaranteed to be admin if using the backdoor method?
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: We might need to be able to customize this, but it is for another time.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: Registration key should be asserted as null also
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: Only admins can search instructors, and we have no reason to hide anything from admin. This line can be removed.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.message: Remove Instructor Google ID from Output

timeline.bodyText: I have checked the access control logic again. It is not necessarily only co-owner can see the Google ID, but rather anyone who has canmodifyinstructor permission.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.message: Change access control to appropriate permission
